ProductInfo.Features:
GSM EDGE Quad Band - 850/900/1800/1900; Supported 3G WCDMA Modes: 850/900/1900/2100 MHz
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot; Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP, EDR
Unlocked to work on any GSM network anywhere in the world.  USA - AT&T;, T-mobile / MetroPCS (2G only);Canada - Rogers / FIDO / Chatr / Bell / Koodo / Virgin / City; Africa / Europe / Asia - all GSM carriers
Incompatible Networks: Canada: Wind / Mobilicity / Videoron   USA: Verizon / Sprint / Virgin / T-mobile 3G (check with carrier) / All CDMA carriers.
SIM Card type: Mini Simcard (full size); Languages: English, Spanish, French and others; Black Color - Android 4.0 ICS,  4.3" LCD, GSM, New Unlocked, Front Facing VGA Camera, Rear 8MP Camera with Flash, Actual Photos attached; Processor Speed - 1.2 GHz dual core
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V XT885 Android 4.0 Smartphone - Factory Unlocked - GSM 3G - with English and Spanish
